TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(object sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AccessKeyPressedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AccessKeyPressedEventArgs)
public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs ^ e);
type AccessKeyPressedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AccessKeyPressedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示將處理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取中的索引鍵[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]都由管理員類別，做起來就像是一項服務的存取金鑰，並將轉送的存取金鑰輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入系統。Access keys in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] are handled by a manager class that acts somewhat like a service for access keys, and forwards access key input to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input system. 而不是處理按下事件，特別是藉由附加的處理常式的存取金鑰附加事件上的特定物件，它通常是比較好的作法，透過命令繫結相關聯的特定命令的存取金鑰，然後處理路由的命令，透過對應的路由事件。Rather than handling access key pressed events specifically by attaching a handler for the attached event on a specific object, it is generally a better practice to associate the access key with a particular command through a command binding, and then handle the routed commands through the corresponding routed events. 這項技術會提供統一的事件系統的使用者輸入，無論使用何種輸入的模式起始的輸入。This technique provides a unified event system for user input regardless of what input mode initiated the input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
